page.title: 17COUNTY COUNCILLOR
page.content: Mr.Drenon has lived in Brandon all his life and became interested in local government because he wanted to help the area he lived in.Each day he attends meetings in County Hall, Durham, headquarters of the County Council. He reads his post,takes his messages and investigates any queries left for him. He enjoys all aspects of meeting and helping the people of Brandon and would like to bring more jobs to the area. He is very pleased that the new sports centre is nearly completed, but thinks Brandon could still do with more shops. some days there are not enough hors for him to do all his work, but he would not move from the area, he is dedicated to help.
